ProductInfo.Features:
Shell material: durable metal
100% brand new and high quality 1/3" Color CMOS 420 TV Lines Waterproof IR Security Camera Video Surveillance.
This camera has a great combination with 420 TV Lines, a 3.6mm lens and up to 30ft illumination range.
With 24 built-in IR LEDs, this camera can capture video in night vision mode up to 65ft away.
This bullet camera is designed for indoor or outdoor use, and can easily be mounted for the perfect viewing angle.
ProductInfo.Name: Foxnovo CCTV 1/3" Color CMOS 420 TV Lines IR Security Waterproof Camera Video Surveillance with Night Vision (Black)
